error.message: The IUnitOfWorkFactory is registered as 'Lifetime Scope' lifestyle, but the instance is requested outside the context of a Lifetime Scope.
error.detail: System.InvalidOperationException: An error occurred when trying to create a controller of type 'Concesionarios.UI.Web.Controllers.HomeController'.
